seo.title: Import excel and CSV files into ElasticSearch - with Exelastic
seo.description: Easy to use web and commandline based file importer for ElasticSearch. Free to use and easy to set up.

text.heading: Excelastic
text.subheading: Import utility for ElasticSearch for excel and CSV files.

hint_1.title: Commandline
hint_1.content: Using the commandline mode in Excelastic you are able to automate tasks using your favorite scripting language.

hint_2.title: Accessible
hint_2.content: With an user friendly web interface employees in sales/management can use it too! If you need authentication simply setup a reverse proxy.

hint_3.title: Up-to-date
hint_3.content: We aim to always stay up to date with the latest elasticsearch version, bringing you the greatest performance and latest fixes!

license.name: MIT
license.description: Free to use for personal and commercial purposes.

instructions.end: This starts the server with the management website enabled. Its also possible to import straight from the command line.
